snippet.title: Crashday: Redline Edition (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
More speed. More destruction. More fun than ever before! 

GET IT NOW ON STEAM: http://store.steampowered.com/app/508980/Crashday_Redline_Edition/

The destructive multiplayer classic is back on Steam with a fully overhauled edition! Created by the original developers of the 2006 PC racing game Crashday, we're happy to bring back great memories with the game's official re-release version: Crashday: Redline Edition!

Crashday: Redline Edition is the multiplayer arcade racer with near limitless possibilities! Race. Wreck. Shoot. Smash. Seven game modes. Battle online and offline. On roads and in arenas. Design and share your own tracks. Enjoy user-made mods, circuits, and cars from Steam Workshop. Play the game in the way you like. Today there are no rules. Today is Crashday!

MORE ABOUT CRASHDAY :
http://www.crashday.com

SHARE THIS VIDEO:
https://youtu.be/izESLlRnTik
